title: Mobile-Pack: The Original Cartless Housekeeping Solution
text:
International Luxury Hotel Association
PALM BEACH, Fla. , Aug. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Mobile-Pack began in 2006 when Kay Washington was looking for a convenient carrying case as an alternative to a bulky cleaning cart. She couldn't find anything suitable to hold both cleaning supplies and room replenishment items. So she invented one, and the Mobile-Pack was born.
Today, the Mobile-Pack is used by many of the world's leading hotels. Hoteliers have discovered that its smaller footprint protects the asset of the hotel by keeping the carpet, baseboards and walls in guest corridors clean and scuff free. The Mobile-Pack also makes it easier for staff to move quickly for efficient cleaning, and its discreet appearance leaves an impression on guests looking for an upscale experience.
As the company has grown so have the amount of products that Mobile-Pack offers. Mobile-Pack now offers 9 different models and will add 2 more models by the end of 2015. By listening to their customers they have been able to design products that fit hotels with just a few rooms up to convention type products with over 1,200 rooms. Each pack is made with ballistic nylon material that does not absorb water and repels stains which extends the life of the pack.
Mobile-Pack is a company founded by hoteliers for hotels. With their vast experience in the hotel industry they are able to assist hotels when making the change to going cartless. Mobile-Pack offers a Jump Start Kit which helps guide hotels "how to implement the cartless solution." The Jump Start Kit provides details on how to organize the linen and storage closets, how to organize the packs and explains the cleaning process.
For more information about the Mobile-Pack and where to purchase please email info@mobile-pack.com and a representative will respond within 24 hours.
Meet the Mobile-Pack Team at the International Luxury Hotel Association's Fast Forward 2020 Luxury Hotel conference & Hospitality Wellness Expo taking place in Orlando, 27-29 September, 2015.
About Mobile-Pack
Mobile-Pack was founded in 2006 and is the leading provider of cartless housekeeping solutions to the hotel industry. The Mobile-Pack is sold globally and can be seen in many of the world's leading hotels. Learn more at www.mobile-pack.com .
About International Luxury Hotel Association (ILHA)
The ILHA ( http://www.luxuryhotelassociation.org ) is the luxury hotel industry's premier professional association. Its vision is to be the preeminent association promoting, unifying and advancing the luxury hotel industry through insight, opinion and research. ILHA is the largest influencer in the luxury hotel industry and reaches an audience of more than 225,000 hotel professionals in 90+ countries. It also produces the ILHA SmartBrief, the luxury hotel industry's daily news brief and their Luxury Hotel Conference each year. The ILHA provides several media channels to help connect the business world with the luxury hotel industry.
